title: What are some good songs to fuel your rage? - Quora

response.answer_text: I listen to hyped up songs with a lot of bass and drops because it feels satisfying. Generally, people like listening to heavy metal when in rage. But I don't really like listening to heavy metal. So, I can't guarantee you will like that but I will still suggest some - Far too Loud - Lightbringer  MISSIO - Bottom of the deep blue sea  Illenium - Pray  Well, there are not that great but it's all I can think of. Sorry for the bad choice. I'll add more when I remember. Toodles, Umaiza.

“Erase You” by Thorne Empire “Verse 1   It must be hard to be you  'Coz you all in my business  Must be searching for God  'Coz you've been playing my witness  You must be broken inside  'Coz you've been acting like a sissy  It's easy to see your emotion describe  You hate me, 'coz you ain't me  And you miss me   Pre-Chorus   You see me, on a screen  But you ain't seen a thing  Keep coming at me  I'm gonna erase you from history   Chorus   I'm the boss  I'm the king  Kneel, kneel before me   I'm the God  I'm the Titan  No one above me   I'm the boss  I'm the king  Kneel, kneel before me   I'm the God  I'm the Titan  No one above me   Verse 2   I was made by the streets  Now I am post up in a mansion  Think you can take me, then try if you must  But trust me, I grow and I grow like expansions   I was made by the streets  Now I am post up in a mansion  Think you can take me then try if you must  But trust me, I grow and I grow like expansions   Pre-Chorus   You see me, on a screen  But you ain't seen a thing  Keep coming at me  I'm gonna erase you from history   Chorus   I'm the boss  I'm the king  Kneel, kneel before me   I'm the God  I'm the Titan  No one above me   I'm the boss  I'm the king  Kneel, kneel before me   I'm the God  I'm the Titan  No one above me   Outro   You see me, on a screen  But you ain't seen a thing  Keep coming at me  I'm gonna erase you from history”
